document_data.name: Volo's Guide to the Dalelands
document_data.author: [[Volothamp Geddarm]]
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}{{Cite web enhancement/The Leaves of Learning|5}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Volo's Guide to the Dalelands''''' was a book written by [[Volothamp Geddarm]]. It was a travelogue about the [[Dalelands]]. It was written over [[1368 DR|1368]] to [[1368 DR]].

Around [[1372 DR]], one copy was kept in the Tower of Tomes of the [[Leaves of Learning]], a temple to [[Oghma]] in [[Deepingdale]]. Another copy was in the holdings at [[Candlekeep]].
